EXPIRED_DISCOUNT: Discount has expired and cannot be used.
ALREADY_USED_DISCOUNT: The discount has already been used.
DISABLED_DISCOUNT_GROUP: This discount group is not available.
LIMIT_EXCESS_DISCOUNT_GROUP: The number of issuances of the discount group has been exceeded.
CANNOT_CANCEL_DISCOUNT: Discounts that have already been used or have expired cannot be cancelled.
INVALID_DISCOUNT_INFO: You must enter either a percentage amount, a static amount, or a static time.
EXISTS_DISCOUNT_GROUP_NAME: A discount group with the same name already exists.
CANNOT_FIND_DISCOUNT_GROUP: The discount group does not exist.
